entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.9°C

Observed at: Lynn Lake Airport 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

Temperature: -30.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
